title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: Currently, there is no UI in the preferences settings that allows users to define the default line delimiters for new files in Eclipse when using Windows workstations as X terminals.
EB: There should be a UI in the preferences settings that allows users to define the default line delimiters for new files in Eclipse when using Windows workstations as X terminals.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open Eclipse on a Windows workstation used as an X terminal. 
2. Navigate to the preferences settings. 
3. Look for an option to define the default line delimiters for new files. 
4. Note that there is no such option currently available.
